title: SLA vs SLO vs SLI: What’s the Difference?
author: Sara Miteva
description: Explore the distinctions between SLA, SLO and SLI. Learn about their importance, how Checkly works with them and grasp key concepts for SLAs.
cntitle: SLA 与 SLO 与 SLI：有什么区别？
cndescription: 探索 SLA、SLO 和 SLI 之间的区别。了解它们的重要性、Checkly 如何与它们协同工作，以及 SLA 的关键概念。
